content.description: It is 2022. And currently, the money making opportunity in India is huge. Foreign investors are investing heavily in India. In the last 20 years, NIFTY CAGR was roughly 12.5% India is growing at a massive rate. With all these positive changes coming in, one can easily grow their wealth at 15% CAGR.Right now, the median age in India is 28 years. If we assume a life expectancy of 70 years, most people have a career of 40 years ahead of them. In these 40 years, you can either choose to be rich or choose to be poor.
